dotnetType.name: RecordSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" /> and attempts to map
            it to classes or structs.

overloads.summary: Creates a new record serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the resolution is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.RecordResolution" /> and the
            schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" />; an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a record serializer for a type-schema pair.
The serializer builder to use to build field serializers.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RecordSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
